project_descr: Strengthening weather, climate and hydrological monitoring capabilities, early warning systems and available information for responding to extreme weather and planning adaptation to climate change in Tanzania.

outputs.output_descr: The objective of the project is to strengthen the weather, climate and hydrological monitoring capabilities, early warning systems and available information for responding to extreme weather and planning adaptation to climate change in Tanzania.

project_title: climate information & early warning systems in tanzania
